SELECT bb.*, t.change_date, t.tag_name, g.*, u.book_url, u.book_url_ctr AS count, t.tas_id, -1 AS rating, -1 AS number_of_ratings FROM ( SELECT , b.group FROM bookmark b JOIN urls u USING (book_url_hash) WHERE b.group >= 0 AND b.content_id > #lastContentId# ORDER BY b.content_id ASC LIMIT #limit# ) AS bb LEFT JOIN tas t USING (content_id) LEFT JOIN groupids g ON (bb.group = g.group) LEFT JOIN urls u ON (u.book_url_hash = bb.intraHash)

SELECT bb.*, t.change_date, t.tag_name, g.*, u.book_url, u.book_url_ctr AS count, t.tas_id, -1 AS rating, -1 AS number_of_ratings FROM ( SELECT , b.group FROM bookmark b JOIN urls u USING (book_url_hash) WHERE b.group >= 0 ORDER BY b.book_url_hash ASC LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #lastOffset# ) AS bb LEFT JOIN tas t USING (content_id) LEFT JOIN groupids g ON (bb.group = g.group) LEFT JOIN urls u ON (u.book_url_hash = bb.intraHash)

SELECT bb.*, t.tag_name, g.*, t.tas_id, -1 AS rating, -1 AS number_of_ratings FROM ( SELECT , b2.group, 1 AS count, b2.scraperid, b2.change_date FROM bibtex b2 WHERE b2.group >= 0 AND b2.content_id > #lastContentId# ORDER BY b2.content_id ASC LIMIT #limit# ) AS bb LEFT JOIN tas t USING (content_id) LEFT JOIN groupids g ON (bb.group = g.group)

SELECT bb.*, t.tag_name, g.*, t.tas_id, -1 AS rating, -1 AS number_of_ratings FROM ( SELECT , b2.group, 1 AS count, b2.scraperid FROM bibtex b2 WHERE b2.group >= 0 ORDER BY b2.simhash1 ASC LIMIT #limit# OFFSET #lastOffset# ) AS bb LEFT JOIN tas t USING (content_id) LEFT JOIN groupids g ON (bb.group = g.group)

SELECT , b.change_date, b.group, 'public' AS group_name, 1 AS count, b.content_id, -1 AS rating, -1 AS number_of_ratings FROM gold_standard b WHERE b.content_id > #lastContentId# AND content_type = 2 ORDER BY b.content_id ASC LIMIT #limit#
